topic.title: Existence Of Known Non Drug Allergy - conformance rules

section.p: Indicator of whether patient has any allergies or sensitivities to materials other than drugs

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11499 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.103"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11214)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11664)/@code="69747-4" Does the patient have any environmental allergies NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10214)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:10215)
If NEMSIS EHistory.07 has no values, this is FALSE; otherwise it is TRUE.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11214)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11664)/@code="69747-4" Does the patient have any environmental allergies NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10214)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:10215)
If NEMSIS EHistory.07 has no values, this is FALSE; otherwise it is TRUE.
